title: #67 Game Shows
itunes:title: #67 Game Shows
description:
What's the best way to be chosen as a contestant on The Price Is Right? Who should be the next host of Jeopardy? Is Wheel Of Fortune biased towards Southern contestants? Nate, Aaron, and Brian discuss these topics and more this week when their topic is Game Shows. 

 

Co-hosts: Brian Bates ( https://www.instagram.com/brianbatescomic) & Aaron Weber ( https://www.instagram.com/realaaronweber)

 

Podcast produced by Nate & Laura Bargatze

Recording & Editing by Genovations Media

https://www.natebargatze.com

https://www.allthingscomedy.com

https://www.genovationsmedia.com

Email - Nateland@NateBargatze.com

That's KEEPS.COM/NATE to get your first month FREE!
